title: Hoping for Boring Politics (with James Gray MP)
itunes:title: Hoping for Boring Politics (with James Gray MP)
description:
Conservative MP for North Wiltshire, James Gray, says he is not in favor of more Covid restrictions, but he is prepared to listen to the arguments. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that he is hoping politics will be more boring in 2022.

Plus Oksana Pyzik from the UCL School of Pharmacy says the U.K. needs to do more to minimize transmission between children. But she is hopeful this will be the last winter where we have to make difficult decisions to protect the NHS.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Conservative MP for North Wiltshire, James Gray, says he is not in favor of more Covid restrictions, but he is prepared to listen to the arguments. He tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts that he is hoping politics will be more boring in 2022.

Plus Oksana Pyzik from the UCL School of Pharmacy says the U.K. needs to do more to minimize transmission between children. But she is hopeful this will be the last winter where we have to make difficult decisions to protect the NHS.
